name: I've finally got around to updating https://auth.hawx.me/ to use the prefixed api key format for tokens, which means I have removed all previous data. On the plus side the database no longer contains usable raw data https://github.com/hawx/relme-auth/pull/14

content.html: I've finally got around to updating https://auth.hawx.me/ to use the prefixed api key format for tokens, which means I have removed all previous data. On the plus side the database no longer contains usable raw data https://github.com/hawx/relme-auth/pull/14
content.value: I've finally got around to updating https://auth.hawx.me/ to use the prefixed api key format for tokens, which means I have removed all previous data. On the plus side the database no longer contains usable raw data https://github.com/hawx/relme-auth/pull/14
